response.overview: The second installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. In the toilet in a certain park, there have been an abominable incident in the past. After the incident, psychic phenomena occurred frequently. Hearing such a rumor, a young man visited the rumored toilet again, where he encountered a repeated poltergeist. An endless chain of fear strikes one after another.
response.tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
response.title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 2

titles.title: 超! ! 怖い心霊ビデオ2
